short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button to browse files of a package on NPM

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button on the pages of a package on npmjs.com. It allows you to explore the published files instead of using the git repository (which does not always correspond to the published files).
